title: AAM's Colyer on Equities: Avoid Defensive and Expensive (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Scott Colyer, CEO and Chief Investment Officer of Advisors Asset Management (AAM), on his investment and economic outlook.
